episodes.title: Occultic Values with Olivia Taylor Dudley
episodes.summary: Bowser is hosting solo again but is joined by Olivia Taylor Dudley! They discuss coffin clubs, body found at the Magic Castle and demon toys!

episodes.title: The Life and Times of Ted Raimi
episodes.summary: Bowser is joined by special guest Ted Raimi to discuss some Weird of the Week, Ted's career and read a listener story!

episodes.title: Ye Who Smelt It with Karyn Kusama
episodes.summary: Bowser and Jess are joined by special guest Karyn Kusama (The Invitation, XX)! They talk all about her films and the horror genre, another case of rectum smuggling, murder text and listener stories!

episodes.title: Beware The Slenderman!
episodes.summary:
Jess and Bowser are back this week to talk about the gold butt smuggler, a long lost continent and Beware The Slenderman on HBO! 

Want more Bizarre States? You can watch Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser record their podcast episodes live Wednesdays at 4pm PST on Alpha and YouTube, or catch up on all the episodes you missed on Alpha.

episodes.title: Peter Von Puttkamer
episodes.summary: Andrew and Jess are joined by a special guest, Peter Von Puttkamer! They talk about the slender man, sasquatch and Bowser has gifts!

episodes.title: Dongle Dangle with Alicia Lutes
episodes.summary: Jessica is joined by Nerdist's very own Alicia Lutes! They talk about the dildo bandit, the man with the 19" penis, Japanties USA and ALIENS!

episodes.title: Can you s**t out of your mouth?
episodes.summary:
Bowser and Jess are back this week with "Welcome to Poo Corner", weird Detroit stories, #japanty and Chobot's ghost town trip!

Note: There is a buzz in this episode

episodes.title: Friday The 13th with Brad Meltzer
episodes.summary: To celebrate Friday The 13th, Jess and Bowser are joined by Brad Meltzer to talk about ALL THE CONSPIRACY THEORIES!

episodes.title: Farting Angels
episodes.summary: No guest this week which means we get some awesome butt stories, ghost prince, the Chilean UFO and listener stories!

episodes.title: The Story of Polybius with Todd Luoto and Jon Frechette
episodes.summary: Jess and Bowser are kicking off 2017 with Todd Luoto and Jon Frechette! They start with preshow poop/swear stories, Charles Manson, Sinbad and the story of Polybius!

episodes.title: Dem Squatch boiZ (Mike Shaw and Michael Leffler)
episodes.summary: Jess and Bowser are joined by Dem Squatch boiZ, Mike Shaw and Michael Leffler. We get Squatch updates, a ghost love triangle, the black Dahlia house and listener stories!

episodes.title: Karen Rontowski Can Read!
episodes.summary: Karen Rontowski joins Bowser and Jess to give them a tarot reading, talk about her paranormal experiences, monks mound and listener stories!

episodes.title: Good Chicken with Kyle Kinane & Dave Stone!
episodes.summary: Jess and Bowser are joined by the hosts of The Boogie Monster podcast, Kyle Kinane & Dave Stone! They have an update on Japan's pizza delivering reindeer, the bionic penis, magician wars and listener stories!

episodes.title: Kismet VR - Tarot & Automatons
episodes.summary: Jess is back from her holiday get away and is joined by TWO special guests! Taking over for Bowser this episode is Nerdist Editor-in-Chief, Rachel Heine! Rachel adn Jess are also joined by David Chontos, director of Psyop VR, to play Kismet!

episodes.title: Bizarre States Classic: Jack The Ripper with Ptolemy Slocum
episodes.summary:
Jessica and Bowser are away for Thanksgiving so we decided to run an old classic with Ptolemy Slocum who you can now see on HBO's Westworld! 

Special guest, Ptolemy Slocum, goes over the recent Jack the Ripper discovery with Bizarre States and shares some unnerving stories of the unknown.

Originally aired 9/11/14

episodes.title: The Rake with Jin Kelley
episodes.summary: Bowser and Jess are joined by one of our favorites, Jin Kelley! They talk about a newly discovered ship graveyard, hop pot and the Rake!

episodes.title: Tiki Surf Witches!

episodes.title: Meltdown Overnight
episodes.summary: It's here! The first-ever Video edition of Bizarre States. Chobot and Bowser hunker down in the haunted Meltdown Comics building for a night-vision cloaked overnight! Hear the history of the spooky comic shop, listener stories, and a special reading from everyone's favorite childhood nightmare-inducer SCARY STORIES TO TELL IN THE DARK. Will Chobot and Bowser make it out alive? Do they contact the other side through the use of a Ouija Board? Does Bowser learn the name of the unrestful spirit? Watch the episode and find out!

episodes.title: Max Landis

Barbara also discusses what it was like growing up as the daughter of a traveling carnival worker - and divulges a personal experience involving Astral projection.

episodes.title: The Evil Within with Dave Clayman
episodes.summary:
Jess and Bowser sit down with guest Dave Clayman from Bethesda to talk The Evil Within and the Oklahoma Black Mass!

DOH! Bowser and I didn't realize this was going to go up after the Oklahoma Black Mass was to already occur. We will just have to keep those TMNT ideas percolating till next time! For Black Mass updates - head to our Bizarre StatesFacebook Page!

episodes.summary: Special guest Reuben Langdon talks to us about the aliens that already walk amongst us.

episodes.title: Chobot's Real Life Haunting on the Queen Mary!
episodes.summary: Join Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser as they lift the veil and showcase the hauntings, urban myths, unsolved murders and general oddities that everyone has experienced but no one wants to talk about.
